quote-source: A sonnet produced by The Pentametron, which looks for tweets which happen to be in iambic pentameter.
quote-text:
I’m sorry you believed her over me.
low key upset the thunder lost tonight
True beauty is reflected from the soul.
Tonight’s the night the world begins again

I have a reputation to uphold.
I wanna date another scorpio!
Love isn’t complicated, people are.
I’m only bringing this upon myself/:

so….twitter is distracting me…..a lot.
Nick Swisher is the mother fucking MAN!
Can’t hear & pounding headache, goodnight world
Erotic had a good performance. #great

@Mariah_Neutron uncles, cousins, aunts !?
I wanna Dance, And Love, And Dance Again!â«âª
